tag_list: serial-entrepreneur, iphone, mobile, music, technology, forex, web-apps, html5, android
overview:
Cole Flournoy is a serial entrepreneur with a strong skill set in bleeding-edge web and mobile technology. Recently relocated to San Francisco, he is now founding LetsListen, a social cloud music locker in the group listening space.

As a hands-on and highly technical founder, he is an expert in cloud scalability. His company, Forex On The Go, provides the most popular Forex trading software for the iPhone which additionally is white labeled by over 30 brokers.

Cole is a passionate entrepreneur and started several profitable businesses even before graduating high school. While in college he founded an online lift ticket sales platform which became the top third party lift ticket vender on the southern east coast. At Radford University he was co-founder of Collegiate Entrepreneurs, founder of the Snowboard and Ski Club, and received a BS in Computer Science with a minor in Biology.

When Cole is not busy building startups, you will find him getting into outdoor adventures such as snowboarding, wakeboarding, hiking and even flying tubes. He also has deep interests in biotechnology (specifically cancer and human aging research), clean energy tech and robotics. He has two older sisters, MD Jamie Kalantar and Harvard JD Chrystie Swiney, and acts as an advisor to his younger brother Sam Flournoy (student and green tech entrepreneur).

degrees.subject: Computer Science, Database concentration, Minor in Biology
